article.name: I've set up Google Cloud (GCP) Integration, but the host won't integrate with Mackerel
article.title: I've set up Google Cloud (GCP) Integration, but the host won't integrate with Mackerel
article.body:
Please review and confirm the following.

  • Make sure that the Cloud API is enabled. This must be enabled in order for Mackerel to get metrics
  • Make sure that the service account to be used with Google Cloud Integration does not have global permissions or those higher than viewer.
  • Make sure that the service account has been assigned a role that is compatible with the service you are trying to integrate.
  • If you have specified a label in "Filter by label", make sure that the label has been correctly assigned to the target Google Cloud resource as well.
